content: Hello. I am your AI assistant inside AesopIDE. Ask me about your code or project and I will help.
write "hello" into a new file called test.txt at the project root
Okay, I've written `test.txt`. What would you like to do next, or what is the overall task you're trying to accomplish?
The core component pattern we use is functional components with hooks. Remember this.
Hello! I'm ready to assist you. Please tell me what you'd like to work on today.
